page.title: 04Farms in Braintree and Rayne
page.content: There are twenty three farms in our D-block, mostly to the north and west of the area, away from the town of Braintree. The farmers grow mainly{cereal {crops}including oats, winter and spring barley, and corn. There are two farms which informed us of growing tic beans for animal foodstuff. Pastures for{grazing}of cattle does exist. {Dairy cattle}for milk production are held by ten farms.{Hens}for production of eggs are kept on a further six farms. There are a small number of{beef {cattle}in our area on the farms between Rayne and Panfield. There are small areas of{rough {grazing land}to the northeast of Rayne.
